contentheadline.headline: List of United States firearms topics

contentrichtext.text: {{Cleanup|date=July 2008}} ==Legal Topics== {| border="0" cellpadding="2" |{{USgunlegalbox}} |} ==Primary Organizations== {{USgunorgs}} ==Prominent individuals== ===Advocates of firearms ownership=== *[[Gary Kleck]] *[[Charlton Heston]] *[[Wayne LaPierre]] *[[John Lott]] *[[Ted Nugent]] *[[Tom Selleck]] *[[Jerry Falwell]] *[[Sarah Palin]] *[[Mitt Romney]] *[[Kurt Russell]] *[[Chuck Yeager]] *[[Clint Eastwood]] *[[Angelina Jolie]] *[[Brad Pitt]] *[[James Earl Jones]] *[[Miranda Lambert]] *[[Bruce Willis]] *[[Chuck Norris]] *[[Gary Sinise]] *[[Johnny Depp]] *[[Dalai Lama]] *[[Charlie Daniels]] *[[Steven Seagal]] *[[Ice-T]] *[[Hank Williams Jr.]] *[[Joe Mantegna]] *[[Chuck Woolery]] ===Advocates of firearms control=== *[[Michael D. Barnes]] *[[Michael A. Bellesiles]] *[[James Brady]] *[[Sarah Brady]] *[[Tom Diaz]] *[[Arthur Kellermann]] *[[Michael Moore]] *[[Josh Sugarmann]] [[Category:Society-related lists|Firearms, United States]] {{firearms-stub}} {{US-stub}}
